result.arabic_text: فَوَرَبِّكَ لَنَحۡشُرَنَّهُمۡ وَٱلشَّيَٰطِينَ ثُمَّ لَنُحۡضِرَنَّهُمۡ حَوۡلَ جَهَنَّمَ جِثِيّٗا
result.translation: (68) So by your Lord, We will surely gather them and the devils; then We will bring them to be present around Hell upon their knees.[822]
result.footnotes: [822]- i.e., fallen on their knees from terror or dragged there unwillingly on their knees.
